modName: Hearthfire Display Case Fix - Unofficial Hearthfire Patch Edition
summary: This is a modified edition of HearthFire Display Case Fix that includes changes from the Unofficial Hearthfire Patch.
descriptionHtml: This is a modified edition of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40400/?]HearthFire Display Case Fix[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3370023]Krucify[/url] that includes changes from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25127/?]Unofficial Hearthfire Patch[/url]. Load it instead of the original HearthFire Display Case Fix esp.
author: Fjolfrin
